ModMetaData.name: OmniMatter
ModMetaData.author: Daemon976
ModMetaData.description:
Adds advanced nanotech materials to your rimworld. Barely within your ability to create, these materials offer unparalled flexibility and durability to all structures and equipment.
OmniMatter: Strong, dense material for construction and armor. Self-repairing over time. OmniWeave: Flexible fusion of OmniMatter and Hyperweave. Self-repairing over time.
Note: If you think other super-material mods just aren't cheaty enough for you, try this. It passes a self-repair ability onto *everything* you make with it thanks to Community Framework.
